headline.main: PARK AVE. CANTEEN OBJECT OF INQUIRIES; District Attorney and Hodson Seek Explanations From Promoter of Project WELL-KNOWN NAMES USED Enterprise to Present Service Men to Debutantes Linked to 30,000,000 Dimes Scheme

lead_paragraph: Two investigations centered on the activities of George L. Fecke, involving the promotion of a series of organizations the most prominent of which was the proposed Park Avenue Canteen for service men, were under way yesterday.
snippet: Two investigations centered on the activities of George L. Fecke, involving the promotion of a series of organizations the most prominent of which was the proposed Park Avenue Canteen for service men, were under way yesterday....
